Scripts.OnClick: GuildPanel.isSelectedSocialTab = false GuildPanel:HideWindow() FriendsFrame:Show() PanelTemplates_SetTab(FriendsFrame, 1) FriendsFrame_Update()
GuildPanel.isSelectedSocialTab = false GuildPanel:HideWindow() FriendsFrame:Show() PanelTemplates_SetTab(FriendsFrame, 2) FriendsFrame_Update()
GuildPanel.isSelectedSocialTab = false GuildPanel:HideWindow() FriendsFrame:Show() PanelTemplates_SetTab(FriendsFrame, 4) FriendsFrame_Update()
GuildPanel.isSelectedSocialTab = false GuildPanel:HideWindow() FriendsFrame:Show() PanelTemplates_SetTab(FriendsFrame, 5) FriendsFrame_Update()

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: Embed GuildPanel into the Social (O) frame.

Scripts.OnClick: if self:GetChecked() == nil then self:SetChecked(true) else getglobal(self:GetParent():GetName().."SoloModeButton"):SetChecked(false) GuildPanel.db.char.activationMode = "EMBED" GuildPanel:SetupActivation() end

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: Show GuildPanel only with its hotkey.

Scripts.OnClick: if self:GetChecked() == nil then self:SetChecked(true) else getglobal(self:GetParent():GetName().."EmbedModeButton"):SetChecked(false) GuildPanel.db.char.activationMode = "SOLO" GuildPanel:SetupActivation() end

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: Snap to Social (O) frame. (Embed mode only)

Scripts.OnClick: if self:GetChecked() == 1 then GuildPanel.db.char.snapToSocial = true else GuildPanel.db.char.snapToSocial = false end

FontString.name: $parentInfoText
FontString.text: Right click on a button for more info.

FontString.name: $parentInfoText
FontString.text: Guild Control features must currently be used with the|nstandard panel.

Scripts.OnClick: if ( GuildControlPopupFrame:IsShown() ) then GuildControlPopupFrame:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", GuildFrame, "TOPRIGHT", -37, -6) GuildControlPopupAcceptButton:SetScript("OnClick", GuildControlPopupAcceptButton_OnClick) GuildControlPopupFrame:Hide(); else GuildControlPopupFrame:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", GuildPanelWindow, "TOPRIGHT", 0, -6) GuildControlPopupAcceptButton:SetScript("OnClick", GuildPanelGuildControlPopupAcceptButton_OnClick) GuildFramePopup_Show(GuildControlPopupFrame); end
if self:GetChecked() == 1 then GuildControlSetRankFlag(1, true) else GuildControlSetRankFlag(1, false) end
if self:GetChecked() == 1 then GuildControlSetRankFlag(3, true) else GuildControlSetRankFlag(3, false) end
if self:GetChecked() == 1 then GuildControlSetRankFlag(2, true) else GuildControlSetRankFlag(2, false) end
if self:GetChecked() == 1 then GuildControlSetRankFlag(4, true) else GuildControlSetRankFlag(4, false) end
if self:GetChecked() == 1 then GuildControlSetRankFlag(5, true) else GuildControlSetRankFlag(5, false) end
if self:GetChecked() == 1 then GuildControlSetRankFlag(6, true) else GuildControlSetRankFlag(6, false) end
if self:GetChecked() == 1 then GuildControlSetRankFlag(7, true) else GuildControlSetRankFlag(7, false) end
if self:GetChecked() == 1 then GuildControlSetRankFlag(8, true) else GuildControlSetRankFlag(8, false) end
if self:GetChecked() == 1 then GuildControlSetRankFlag(9, true) else GuildControlSetRankFlag(9, false) end
if self:GetChecked() == 1 then GuildControlSetRankFlag(10, true) else GuildControlSetRankFlag(10, false) end
if self:GetChecked() == 1 then GuildControlSetRankFlag(12, true) else GuildControlSetRankFlag(12, false) end
if self:GetChecked() == 1 then GuildControlSetRankFlag(11, true) else GuildControlSetRankFlag(11, false) end
if self:GetChecked() == 1 then GuildControlSetRankFlag(13, true) else GuildControlSetRankFlag(13, false) end
if self:GetChecked() == 1 then GuildControlSetRankFlag(14, true) GuildControlSetRankFlag(17, true) else GuildControlSetRankFlag(14, false) GuildControlSetRankFlag(17, false) end
